polis mulya aparadha wimarshana eekakaye katayuthu sambandhayen aarambhaye sitama itha dadi wiwechanathmaka piliwethak anugamanaya kala polispathi jayasundara, nithiya ha samaya pilibada amathyawarayage niyamaya anuwa katayuthu karamin, polis mulya aparadha wimarshana eekakaye katayuthu sambandhayen wimarshanayak pawathwima sadaha jeyashta polis adhikari mewan silwage nayakathwayen yuthu wishesha wimarshana eekakaya anuyuktha kale ya.polis mulya wimarshana eekakaye adhyaksha pi.ke.di.priyantha mahathagen prakashayak satahan karaganimata mema eekakata mulinma katayuthu kala athara, udasana 9.00 sita sawasa 5.30 dakwa paya atahamarakata aasanna kalayak ee sadaha waya kale ya.awasanaye balu kala ema prakashaya pitu 35k pura satahanwa thibina.prakasha satahan karaganima sadaha anathuruwa kadawune niyojya polis adhikariwarun saha wimarshakawarun kandayamaki.mese polis mulya wimarshana eekakaye niladharin prashna kirimwalata lakwemin thibena bawa janapathi sirisena danagaththe badada rathriyeya.wahama kriyathmaka wana paridi polis wishesha wimarshana eekakaye ema katayuthu nawatha damana lesa ohu polispathiwarayata niyoga kale ya.polisiye ihala niladharayan athara athiwa thibena gatumkari thaththwaya ohu awabodha karagena sitina athara, me sambandhayen thama jeyashta polis niladharin samaga sakachcha kirimata apekshawen sitina bawa da, ohu sadahan kara thibe.kesewuwa da, janapathiwarayage niyogayen pasu siyalu katayuthu athhitawina.

warshikawa ratawiruwan wisin amarikan dolar biliyana 6k pamana ewana athara 2012 warshaye agosthu masayedi ratawiruwange widesha winimaya pe්rashana 17% n wardhanaya wi athi bawada sandahan kaleya. 2012 warshaye agosthu masayedi amarikan dolar biliyana 475k wu widesha winimaya pe්rashana me wasare agosthu masayedi dolar miliyana 559 dakwa ihala gos thibe.
